title: *Adorable 3 bedroom house located in Westland with Livonia schools--**
posting_body: Adorable 3 bedroom house located in Westland with Livonia schools.
Finished basement, attached car garage, and a beautiful deck.
The house is located near the shopping center, restaurants, fitness center, and minutes away from I-96.
This home includes a family room, 3 bedrooms, a large kitchen, one full bath upstairs and half bath in the finished basement, nice landscaping with a deck in the back, and a fenced yard.
Rent is $1,500 and the security deposit is $2,100.
Appliances include refrigerator, gas stove, and dishwasher.
This is an awesome deal and it will not last.
Please don't waste my time and yours if you do not have the funds.
